data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malyutina, Marina V. (2008): Microcope gen. nov. — a new deep-sea genus of Munnopsidae (Crustacea, Isopoda, Asellota), with description of two new species from the Southern Hemisphere. Zootaxa 1866: 555-574, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183860
